department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase and delivery of office seating to Goose Bay
description: This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/000/PQ and covers a requirement from the following product sub-category (ies) of the SA: - Product sub-category 2 - Side chairs
full_summary:
### 2023 Office Seating Tender Announcement

#### Notice Details

* **Tender Reference**: WS4130881378/AFPID/4153437071
* **Publication Date**: August 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 11, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17205543?extsite=MTcyMDU1NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

#### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is soliciting proposals for the purchase and delivery of office seating to Goose Bay, Newfoundland and Labrador. This requirement falls within Product Subcategory 2 of the Supplies Arrangement (SA) E60PQ-120001/000/PQ.

#### Required Product

The tender is seeking the following products:

* Side chairs

#### Exclusions and Requirements

This procurement is set aside for Indigenous businesses and is excluded from international trade agreements under their set-aside provisions for small and minority businesses. Additionally, this procurement is not subject to Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Security clearance is not a requirement for this tender.

#### Eligibility Criteria

Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid. Non-Supply Arrangement holders may submit a bid to the Identified User (IU) but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation. Canada is not required to delay the award of a resulting contract pending the evaluation of an arrangement and issuance of a SA.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Maryse Cyr at maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Related Information

Suppliers interested in learning more about pre-qualifying as a holder of a Supply Arrangement can contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

Procurement details and related documentation can be found on the PSPC's website. A deadline for responses is not specified, however, bidders are expected to submit their proposals in a timely manner so as not to delay the tender's closing date. A notification to the Identifying User (IU) will suffice in submitting the proposal. No bullet points are needed.  A signature and an official number
